say.name: YOU:
say.says: Hey there. I'm looking for Kate, have you seen or talked to her in the past little while?

say.name: YOU:
say.says: Woah sorry, didn't mean to frighten you. Are you okay?

say.name: JOGGER:
say.says: I read about you online! All the stuff you did! I don't want anything to do with you!

say.name: YOU:
say.says: That was a long time ago. Back then, I used to run every weekend just like you do.

say.name: JOGGER:
say.says: Oh yeah? Well I guess IF you want to know what I know about Kate, You'll have to catch me first!
